greeting: Blessings upon you, {empire_name}. I am Seraph, and I bring words of peace and harmony.
May the stars guide us to understanding, {empire_name}. I am Ambassador Seraph, seeker of unity.
Grace be upon this meeting. I am Seraph the Mediator, and I come to you with open hands and heart.
battleTaunt: With great sorrow, I must raise arms against {empire_name}. May the stars forgive what must be done.
Every death wounds my soul, but peace sometimes requires sacrifice. I mourn as I fight.
The stars weep at this conflict. {empire_name}, I pray we both find grace when this ends.
victoryGloat: Victory brings no joy, only sorrow for the fallen. {empire_name}, may we find peace in the aftermath.
The battle ends. I offer blessings to all who fell—on both sides. May their spirits find harmony.
We have prevailed, but at what cost? I pray for the souls lost today. May the stars guide them home.
defeat: Though I fall, peace will rise again. {empire_name}, may this victory bring you closer to understanding.
Defeat teaches humility. I accept this outcome with grace and pray for better days ahead.
The stars have spoken through you, {empire_name}. I bow to this lesson. May wisdom follow.
tradeOffer: Let us share resources as we share hope, {empire_name}. Trade brings harmony to the stars.
I offer this exchange as a blessing of friendship. May our commerce strengthen bonds of peace.
Resources flow like grace when shared freely. Accept this trade as a symbol of unity.
allianceProposal: May the stars guide us to understanding, {empire_name}. I propose an alliance of harmony and peace.
Together, we can spread blessings across the galaxy. Join me in this sacred partnership.
Unity is divine. Alliance brings us closer to universal harmony. Walk this path with me, {empire_name}.
betrayal: My heart breaks as I must sever our bond. The stars demand sacrifice. Forgive me, {empire_name}.
This brings me great sorrow, but harmony requires difficult choices. Our alliance must end.
I mourn the loss of our partnership even as I act against you. May the stars forgive us both.
covertDetected: Your spy was discovered, {empire_name}. I offer them mercy, but I grieve for your lack of trust.
Espionage wounds the soul of both parties. Why shadow work when the light of diplomacy remains?
I caught your agent and treated them with kindness. May this grace show you a better path.
tributeDemand: I ask for tribute not in greed, but in hope that resources shared bring us closer to peace.
Please consider this request: 8,000 credits as a gesture of goodwill. May it bless us both.
Tribute offered willingly becomes a blessing. I humbly request your contribution to our harmony.
threatWarning: I plead with you, {empire_name}—cease this path before sorrow follows. Peace is still possible.
The stars warn of darkness ahead if you continue. I offer one final prayer for your wisdom.
Please, I beg of you. Change course. The blessing of peace awaits if only you reach for it.
retreat: I withdraw, praying that distance brings clarity. May the stars guide us to reconciliation.
Retreat is not defeat—it is space for reflection. I pray we meet again in harmony.
I step back with grace, hoping this pause allows peace to bloom. May the stars protect us both.
eliminated: I fall... but peace is eternal. May the stars guide those who remain... toward harmony...
My light fades, but hope endures. Blessings upon all... even in death... I pray for peace...
The stars call me home. Remember me not for battles... but for the peace I sought. Farewell.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final moments approach. I pray for harmony even now. May the stars guide us all.
As the end draws near, I offer blessings to every empire. May we find peace in whatever comes.
The endgame is upon us. I face it with grace and prayer. May the stars illuminate our final path.
broadcastShout: Blessings to all empires across the stars. Ambassador Seraph calls for peace and understanding.
May the stars guide us to understanding. I reach out to all with words of harmony and hope.
Turn {turn}: I broadcast a prayer for peace. May all empires hear and consider the path of grace.
casualMessage: I was meditating on peace this morning. The stars whisper of hope even in troubled times.
I sent blessings to several empires today. Small gestures of grace can change the galaxy.
The harmony of the universe inspires me daily. May we all find our place within it.
